--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 3/19/03 1:17:56 PM Central Standard Time, 
> EmprzAnastazia@a... writes:
> >> "Far enough."  Empath mentally traces the call, then scans the 
> >> planet.  She guesses the reason for the rally when she finds one 
> >> particular mind.  "Optimus Prime is here."
> >> 
> > 
> > Maxima noticably stiffened. 
> > 
> > The one of the humanoids noticed this. But.. said nothing. 
> > 
> > 'Prime... functioning.. again?!' she thought. "Reply to the one 
who was 
> > locating Decepticons. I wish to know who he is & why he is 
calling for us?" 
> > 
> > 
> > She turned to the one leader of this escort. "Lead on. But.. tell 
me what 
> > you can of this place. I am .. most curious." 
> 
> As the one led started to explain to her the place, she stopped & 
turned to 
> Empath. She listened but contemplated the idea of rendezvousing at 
the 
> coordinates that were given. 
> 
> she turned to Empath. "Remain here if you wish, but I do believe 
that I 
> should investigate this supposed Decepticon." She turned to the 
led, "I must 
> leave. Rest assured we will return."
> 
> before the led could reply, she engaged her flight system, leapt 
into the air 
> & took off towards Carnation's location.

Empath flatly ignores the humanoids, and changes to her own jet 
form.  "I've got things to do, Maxima.  See you around."  She streaks 
through the sky toward the Maximal base.
